scripts.clear-all: rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache out build && npm cache clean --force
scripts.fresh-start: rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache out build && npm cache clean --force && npm run dev-random
scripts.nuclear: rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache out build node_modules package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force && npm install && npm run dev-random
scripts.full-upgrade: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && npm update && npm audit fix --force
scripts.upgrade-and-start: npm run full-upgrade && npm run dev-random
scripts.complete-reset: rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache out build node_modules package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force && npm install && npm update && npm audit fix --force && next build && npm run dev-random
scripts.super-clean: rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache out build node_modules package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force && npm install && npm update && npm audit fix --force && npm run dev-random
scripts.deploy-prep: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.git-deploy: npm run git-add && npm run git-commit 'Deploy: Production build' && npm run git-push
scripts.quick-deploy: npm run deploy-prep && npm run git-deploy
scripts.sync: npm run pull-latest && npm run super-clean
scripts.update-and-deploy: git pull origin main && rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache out build node_modules package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force && npm install && npm update && npm audit fix --force && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'Auto-deploy: Updated dependencies and code' && git push origin main
scripts.mega-deploy: git stash && git pull origin main && git stash pop && rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache out build node_modules package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force && npm install && npm update && npm audit fix --force && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'Mega deploy: Latest code + dependencies' && git push origin main
